Title: Werther
Writer: Mario Camus, Pilar Miró, Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (book)
Actors: Eusebio Poncela, Mercedes Sampietro, Féodor Atkine, Emilio Gutiérrez Caba
Plot: In a city of the north coast of Spain, a young teacher teaches Greek lessons at an elite private school. He is a romantic and melancholy man, who lives alone in the old house of his sailor ancestors on the other side of the bay.
